item.title: Hareesh Kanchanepally
item.description:
Hareesh Kanchanepally

Portfolio Director | Founder | Expert Generalist

Building digital sovereignty tools and enabling parents in the digital age.

Currently building MyDigitAlly (edtech startup) and exploring a stealth hardware project focused on digital sovereignty.

About Me

I’m a Portfolio Director, founder, and builder focused on creating tools that empower people in the digital age.

By Day: Leading product portfolios in agile delivery environments, focusing on prioritization, strategy, and rapid execution.
